907.content: How can I participate in local government or community decisions?
If you attend a town hall, what would you listen for and what is your role as a citizen in such a setting?
Listen to proposals, ask questions, and share concerns respectfully.
What responsibilities do you have when you share your view and debate?
Civic duties mean you must always agree with the majority and never state your own opinion.
How can you express your view while listening to others?
By asking questions, presenting evidence, and considering different perspectives.
